# RecognizedTextObservation.Direction

**Enumeration**

An enum representing which direction the text is read.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Direction
```

## Directions

- **RecognizedTextObservation.Direction.leftToRight**
- **RecognizedTextObservation.Direction.rightToLeft**
- **RecognizedTextObservation.Direction.topToBottom**

## Inspecting an observation

- **boundingRegion**: The bounding region of the text.
- **isTitle**: Whether this text is the title of the document.
- **recognitionLanguages**: The languages in which the recognized text was written.
- **shouldWrapToNextLine**: Whether the text continues on the next line.
- **textDirection**
- **transcript**: The top text candidate as a string.

## Conforms To

- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
